p: To prepare the cinnamon oil, according to the instruction of traditional manuscript (Qarabadin-e-kabir: a well-known Persian pharmacopeia), 500 g of plant's bark coarse powder was soaked 40 days in 3.26 L sesame oil (Golkaran Co., Kashan, Iran) in a glass closed vessel and exposed to the sun during extraction. Traditional cinnamon oil was obtained by filtration of supernatant and kept in dark containers.
